subject: Re: [junit] Re: Testing Static class behavior
msgSnippet: Aha! I apologize for the useless reply if, indeed, this is a third-party library. If possible, decorate their singleton and delegate to it, adding the reset()
messageBody:
Aha! I apologize for the useless reply if, indeed, this is a third-party
library.

If possible, decorate their singleton and delegate to it, adding the reset()
feature. If not, then I don't know what to tell you -- don't use their
stuff. :)
===========================================
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services Inc.
Software development with Java and Extreme Programming
